trans-unit.source: The base class used for storing information for a contract operation defined in a workflow service.
trans-unit.target: 基底類別，用來儲存工作流程服務中定義的合約作業的資訊。

trans-unit.source: When implemented in a derived class, initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.OperationInfoBase"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 在衍生類別中實作時，初始化新執行個體<xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.OperationInfoBase"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: When implemented in a derived class, creates a deep copy of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.OperationInfoBase"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: 在衍生類別中實作時，會建立的深層複本<xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.OperationInfoBase"></xref>執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The copy of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.OperationInfoBase"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 複本<xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.OperationInfoBase"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: Determines if the specified <xref:System.object> is equal to the current instance.
trans-unit.target: 判斷指定<xref:System.object>是否等於目前的執行個體。</xref:System.object>

trans-unit.source: The object to compare with the current instance.
trans-unit.target: 要與目前的執行個體比較的物件。

trans-unit.source: if obj is equal, otherwise .
trans-unit.target: if obj is equal, otherwise .

trans-unit.source: Returns the full name of the contract that implements this operation.
trans-unit.target: 傳回實作這項作業的合約的完整名稱。

trans-unit.source: The service provider associated with this operation.
trans-unit.target: 這項作業相關聯的服務提供者。

trans-unit.source: A string representing the full name of the contract that implements this operation.
trans-unit.target: 表示實作此作業的合約的完整名稱的字串。

trans-unit.source: Returns the type of the contract associated with this operation.
trans-unit.target: 傳回與這項作業相關聯之合約的類型。

trans-unit.source: The service provider associated with this operation.
trans-unit.target: 這項作業相關聯的服務提供者。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Type> object representing the type of the contract associated with this operation.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Type>物件，代表這項作業相關聯之合約類型。</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: Generates a number corresponding to the value of the object to support the use of a hash table.
trans-unit.target: 產生對應至物件的值數目，以支援雜湊資料表的使用。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Int32> representing the hash code value of the object.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Int32>代表物件的雜湊碼值。</xref:System.Int32>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if this operation is one-way, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> if it is two-way.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果這項作業是單向的<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>如果是雙向。

trans-unit.source: The service provider associated with this operation.
trans-unit.target: 這項作業相關聯的服務提供者。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if this operation is one-way, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> if it is two-way.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果這項作業是單向的<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>如果是雙向。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref:System.Reflection.MethodInfo> associated with the operation.
trans-unit.target: 取得<xref:System.Reflection.MethodInfo>與作業相關聯。</xref:System.Reflection.MethodInfo>

trans-unit.source: The service provider associated with this operation.
trans-unit.target: 這項作業相關聯的服務提供者。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Reflection.MethodInfo> object containing details of the operation.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Reflection.MethodInfo>物件，其中包含作業的詳細資料。</xref:System.Reflection.MethodInfo>

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of parameters associated with the operation.
trans-unit.target: 取得與作業相關聯之參數的集合。

trans-unit.source: The service provider associated with this operation.
trans-unit.target: 這項作業相關聯的服務提供者。

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.OperationParameterInfoCollection"></xref> object containing details about the parameters of the operation.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.OperationParameterInfoCollection"> </xref>物件，其中包含有關作業參數的詳細資料。

trans-unit.source: When implemented in a derived class, gets or sets the name associated with this instance.
trans-unit.target: 在衍生類別中實作時，取得或設定與這個執行個體相關聯的名稱。

trans-unit.source: A string representing the object's name.
trans-unit.target: 字串，表示物件的名稱。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the user name associated with the security context of the operation.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定作業的安全性內容相關聯的使用者名稱。

trans-unit.source: A string representing the user name associated with the security context of the operation.
trans-unit.target: 字串，表示作業的安全性內容相關聯的使用者名稱。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the user role (e.g. <xref uid="langword_csharp_Administrator" name="Administrator" href=""></xref>) associated with the security context of the operation.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定使用者角色 (例如<xref uid="langword_csharp_Administrator" name="Administrator" href=""> </xref>) 作業的安全性內容相關聯。

trans-unit.source: A string representing the user role associated with the security context of the operation.
trans-unit.target: 字串，表示作業的安全性內容相關聯的使用者角色。
